title: M&K Tracking
description: M&K Tracking is finally up and running, but business has been the pits for Maggie and Killian... that is until someone tries to open a portal to the pits of the Dark Dimension via Father Killarney's church.When it comes to vanquishing evil, who are you going to call? M&K Tracking. It is a hell of a job, but somebody's gotta do it.WARNING: This book contains cussing, brawling, and unladylike behavior. Proceed at your own risk.
author: Kate Danley
